name: SMASHY BUBBLE- Gotta Pop em All
summary:
A new kind of game that you play with one finger. 
 
SMASHY BUBBLE can be downloaded for free with no additional payment required. 
 
DEFEND YOUR BUBBLE 
Test your reflexes and determination! 
 
SLICE, DICE, and DASH through your enemies to increase your score! 
How long can you last? 
 
UNLOCK NEW CHARACTERS 
Play as 12 different characters! 
Collect GOLD to unlock new characters with SPECIAL ABILITIES! 
 
ONLINE LEADERBOARDS 
Challenge friends and players from around the world! 
 
ADAPTIVE DIFFICULTY 
The game plays as hard as you do, giving the most catered experience in mobile gaming!
